full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI DBANG GI SBYIN SREG GO CHO GA'I NGAG 'DON DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS @016B BYED KYI DBANG GI SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA'I NGAG 'DON DNGOS GRUB 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DPAL LDAN SMAD RGYUD GRVA TSAN GI 'DON RGYUN LTAR NGAG 'DON RAGS RIM TZAM ZHIG BKOD PA YIN LA, SO SO'I GO DON LAG SOGS ZHIB PAR NI RJE THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I LAS BZHI'I SBYIN SREG DNGOS GRUB RGYA MTSO DANG, SHES DKAR ME LONG DANG, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI SBYIN SREG GI CHO GA RNAMS LAS SHES DGOS SHING, TSUL 'DI NI, DGE SLONG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO 'AM, MING GZHAN MTSO BYUNG BLO LDAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, 'DIS KYANG 'JAM MGON RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I MDO SNGAGS KYI BSTAN PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYA LA YUN RIN DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG,)
